com.rake.android.rkmetrics.persistent

Class DbAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rake.android.rkmetrics.persistent.DbAdapter

  • public final class DbAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Not thread-safe. Instances of this class should only be used by a single thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DbAdapter getInstance(Context appContext)

      • addJSON

        public int addJSON(org.json.JSONObject j,
                   DbAdapter.Table table)
        Adds a JSON string representing an event with properties or a person record to the SQLiteDatabase.
        Parameters:
        j - the JSON to record
        table - the table to insert into, either "events"
        Returns:
        the number of rows in the table, or -1 on failure

      • cleanupEvents

        public void cleanupEvents(java.lang.String last_id,
                          DbAdapter.Table table)
        Removes events with an _id <= last_id from table
        Parameters:
        last_id - the last id to delete
        table - the table to remove events from, either "events"

      • cleanupEvents

        public void cleanupEvents(long time,
                          DbAdapter.Table table)
        Removes events before time.
        Parameters:
        time - the unix epoch in milliseconds to remove events before
        table - the table to remove events from, either "events"

      • deleteDB

        public void deleteDB()

      • generateDataString

        public java.lang.String[] generateDataString(DbAdapter.Table table)
        Returns the data string to send to Rake and the maximum ID of the row that we're sending, so we know what rows to delete when a track request was successful.
        Parameters:
        table - the table to read the JSON from, either "events"
        Returns:
        String array containing the maximum ID and the data string representing the events, or null if none could be successfully retrieved.
